data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Lyn's apartment is right next to the train station. Her ____ looks ____ right ____ the ____ waiting ____ the ____. It's ____ loud ____ there - I don't know ____ she ____! But she says that she doesn't even hear the train anymore.
data.partBlankContent: Lyn's apartment is right next to the train station. Her win___ looks o__ right o_ the peo___ waiting f__ the tr___. It's ve__ loud i_ there - I don't know h__ she sle___! But she says that she doesn't even hear the train anymore.
data.answer: 林恩的公寓就在火车站旁边。她的窗户正对着等火车的人。里面太吵了，我不知道她怎么睡的!但她说她都听不到火车的声音了。
